actions.Multiattack: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.Shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Heavy Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d6 + 0 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.Fire Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The veteran exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
